replies.msg: My friend Joe was born in 1990. He's a pisces whereas his girlfriend is a virgo. He's faithful to his girlfriend and would never cheat on her. He's a rabbit lover. In accordance with animal law in Tokyo, if your pet is a social animal you must have at least two of them living together. According to the pet guide and the veterinarians, you should clip your rabbit's nails every month. Rabbits are compatible with other pets if you teach them well. At Tokyo University researcher carried out an experiment last year and this morning where they showed they could bond a rabbit with a cat over a short period of time. They were happy to find their results were compatible with the results of the study that was conducted last year. Hereafter Joe had his cat and his rabbit living together. He believes he'll continue living with them in the hereafter. You can take the house rabbit journals for free and read it at your leisure. Joe speaks four languages fluently. Joe speaks four languages fluently. He told me "because it has a jargonistic tone, instead of saying as per our previous conversation, we can simply say as we discussed or as discussed. Instead of saying as per your request, we can simply say as you requested. Instead of saying as per our agreement, we can just say per we agreed. Instead of please find attached the receipt, we can just say attached is the receipt. Rather than say I enclose herewith two documents, it's more natural to say enclosed are two documents or I've attached two documents. Rather than say here's the report for your perusal, it's more natural to say here's the report for your review. Rather than say please return the form at your earliest convenience, we can just say please return it by next week.
